name: Christmas Matching Pairs - Santa Slaus and Xmas
name_original: Christmas Matching Pairs - Santa Slaus and Xmas
description:
Instructions: Click on the buttons to reveal the pictures

Match 2 or more tiles of the same kind that are stuck together to make them vanish.

Match all of the pictures to win.
You have to match all the pictures and words as quickly as possible.

Get a Playing Score

Easy,Medium,Hard Level to match all of the pictures to win.

Enjoying...
